original_text: You were taught, with regard to your former way of life, to put off your old self, which is being corrupted by its deceitful desires;
korean_text: 너희는 유혹의 욕심을 따라 썩어져 가는 구습을 따르는 옛 사람을 벗어 버리고

sentences.original_text: with regard to your former way of life
to put off your old self
which is being corrupted by its deceitful desires
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 그의 속이는 욕심들에 의해 부패하고 있느니라
